titles.title: Southern Nevada Readiness Center Act
Southern Nevada Readiness Center Act
To provide for the conveyance of certain land in Clark County, Nevada, for use by the Nevada National Guard.

bill.summary: 4/10/2008--Reported to Senate amended. Southern Nevada Readiness Center Act - Permits Clark County, Nevada, to convey approximately 51 acres of land in Clark County to the Nevada Division of State Lands for use by the Nevada National Guard. Provides for the reversion of such land to Clark County for management in accordance with the Southern Nevada Public Land Management Act of 1998 if it ceases to be used by the Nevada National Guard.
